Catalyst has its own in-game currency, one of the unique items is the **Catalyst Coin.**
- Used at any **Safezone Traders** and **Black Market** to purchase **sought after high tier loot and gear.**
There are `many ways` to get Catalyst Coins, below is a list to show the ways to gather these coins.
- `All Server Events` have a chance to spawn Catalyst Coins.
- Selling items back into the `Exchange Trader.`
- `Hidden stashes` and `Oil Rig safes` and `locked safes`.
